Package com.fourier

Class FourierCalculation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fourier.FourierCalculation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DCT, DFT
    public abstract class FourierCalculation
extends java.lang.Object
    This is base class for calculation methods. This class has a template method for calculating 1D Fourier called calculateFourier. Since this is a abstract class calculation methods implemented in child classes but template method will remain same.
    Author:
    Furkan KalabalÄ±k

    • Method Detail

      • calculateFourier

        public final void calculateFourier​(java.lang.String inputFile)
        Template method of Fourier Calculation. Reads N inputs from given file. Calculate outputs for implemented method. Write output to file.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - input file tab separated real numbers

      • readFromFile

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> readFromFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads tab separated file an puts numbers in a ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        filename - file to be read for inputs
        Returns:
        input numbers in ArrayList

      • writeToFile

        private void writeToFile​(java.lang.String result)
        This method takes String output of Fourier Calculation and write result to file.
        Parameters:
        result - Result of Fourier Calculation in String format

      • calculate

        public abstract java.lang.String calculate​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> input)
        This method is changes during among different calculation methods. Takes given input list and creates String output for calculation method. (DFT or DCT)
        Parameters:
        input - input list for calculation
        Returns:
        Output of calculation in String format.

      • isPrintExecutionTime

        boolean isPrintExecutionTime()
        This is the hook method. This method used to determine whether execution time will be printed on screen or not. By default this is false but in any child class this method can be overwrite so it can be made true or can be asked to user whether execution time will be printed screen or not
        Returns:
        true or false, whether execution time will be printed or not.
